body_html:
When i try to run the above code for the first conv layer i get the following error:
TypeError: Expected int32, got <tf.Variable 'W_conv1:0' shape=(5, 5, 1, 32) dtype=float32_ref> of type 'Variable' instead.

Help is appreciated! Thanks!

body:
When i try to run the above code for the first conv layer i get the following error:
TypeError: Expected int32, got <tf.Variable 'W_conv1:0' shape=(5, 5, 1, 32) dtype=float32_ref> of type 'Variable' instead.

Help is appreciated! Thanks!
